mainBoard.name: Fiend Hunter
mainBoard.originalText:
When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature.
When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

rulings.text: If Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield before its first ability has resolved, its second ability will trigger and do nothing. Then its first ability will resolve and exile the target creature indefinitely. This is different from abilities on other cards that exile a permanent “until” something happens.

Once the exiled creature returns, it’s considered a new object with no relation to the object that it was. Auras attached to the exiled creature will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled creature will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creature will cease to exist.
If a token is exiled this way, it won’t return to the battlefield.

In a multiplayer game, if you lose the game, the creature exiled with Fiend Hunter remains exiled indefinitely. This is also different from abilities on other cards that exile a permanent “until” something happens.

mainBoard.text:
When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature.
When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

foreignData.text: , 여행자의 부적을 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아 공개한 후 당신의 손으로 가져간다. 그리고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreignData.flavorText: O ginete partiu pelas brumas misteriosas, coberto de armaduras e carregado de amuletos.
foreignData.name: Amuleto do Viajante
foreignData.text: {1}, Sacrifique Amuleto do Viajante: Procure em seu grimório um card de terreno básico, revele-o e coloque-o em sua mão. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignData.flavorText: Облаченный в доспехи и обвешанный амулетами, всадник тронулся навстречу жутковатому туману.
foreignData.name: Амулет Путешественника
foreignData.text: {1}, пожертвуйте Амулет Путешественника: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли, покажите ее и положите в вашу руку. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreignData.flavorText: 旅人策马穿入神秘雾气，紧裹着铠甲，戴满各式护身符。
foreignData.name: 旅人护身符
foreignData.text: {1}，牺牲旅人护身符：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，并将它置入你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 旅人策馬穿入神秘霧氣，緊裹著鎧甲，戴滿各式護身符。
foreignData.name: 旅人護身符
foreignData.text: {1}，犧牲旅人護身符：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，展示該牌，並將它置入你手上。 然後將你的牌庫洗牌。

mainBoard.name: Traveler's Amulet
mainBoard.originalText: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
